name: Sweet Teriyaki Beef Skewers
author: sheilago7
summary: A grilled and easy way to prepare a delightful beef appetizer or main meat dish! Kids love the tenderness and sweetness, as do the adults.
ingredients: 4 pounds boneless round steak, cut into 1/4-inch slices
directions: Whisk brown sugar, soy sauce, pineapple juice, water, vegetable oil, and garlic together in a large bowl; drop beef slices into the mixture and stir to coat
Marinate beef in refrigerator for 24 hours
Remove beef from the marinade, shaking to remove any excess liquid
Thread beef slices in a zig-zag onto the skewers
Preheat grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate
Cook skewers on preheated grill until the beef is cooked through, about 3 minutes per side
